1.title: Adventures of Patricia
1.plot: When her teen daughter Britana gets pregnant, Patricia experiences d j vu having been a teen mom herself.

2.title: Adventures of Prudence
2.plot: Her world is thrown for a loop when Prudence discovers her 15-year-old daughter Candace is pregnant.

3.title: Adventures of Chantal
3.plot: Recently remarried, 37-year old Chantal is ready to move to Mexico with her new husband but decides to puts her own life on hold when her teenage daughter Carolyn has a baby with her boyfriend Brandon.

imdb.plot outline: 30 Something Grandma follows the stories of three women, Patricia, Prudence and Chantel, who are all about to become grandmothers in their 30's! Having been young moms themselves, these women now face the reality that their own daughters are all about to give birth as teens. The series will reveal the challenges as they try to balance their relationships, career goals and personal dreams.
imdb.title: 30 Something Grandma
plot: _30 Something Grandma_ (qv) follows the stories of three women, Patricia, Prudence and Chantel, who are all about to become grandmothers in their 30's! Having been young moms themselves, these women now face the reality that their own daughters are all about to give birth as teens. The series will reveal the challenges as they try to balance their relationships, career goals and personal dreams.
